main.name: Colin Harker
main.description: I have a love for C++ and lower level programming
main.bio: Use this bio section as your way of describing yourself and saying what you do, what technologies you like to use or feel most comfortable with, describing your personality, or whatever else you feel like throwing in.

education.description: Describe your experience at school, what you learned, what useful skills you have acquired etc.

work.title: Software Engineer Intern
work.description: Worked in a group of three to develop motion analysis and wait time algorithms. • Migrated codebase from Ionic 3 to Ionic 5. Assisted current developers with making the change.  • Integrated Google Maps and Directions API into app and used data to assist wait time algorithms.  • Worked with Metropolitan Washington Airports Authority to acquire flight data from Washington-based airports for use within the app.

work.title: App Developer Intern
work.description: Worked in a group of three to develop motion analysis and wait time algorithms. • Migrated codebase from Ionic 3 to Ionic 5. Assisted current developers with making the change.  • Integrated Google Maps and Directions API into app and used data to assist wait time algorithms.  • Worked with Metropolitan Washington Airports Authority to acquire flight data from Washington-based airports for use within the app.

projects.title: Trajectory Intercept System
projects.category: Using an Arduino, OpenCV and C++, created a system to track moving projectile and intercept it with a nerf bullet

projects.title: Solar System Simulator
projects.category: A C++ visualizer of the orbits of each planet within our solar system. Uses the SFML library.

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.
